Most of these theft projects last a few months at best, and the OP starts a new one quickly after to keep stealing money. Avoid these scams Based on how he posted his announcement about his coin we can easily figure out it's a shit coin in the making, he did not even make an effort to design or give information about his new shitcoin, investors should be wiser now we have thousands of dead coins already if you fall on this one, only two things you never learn or you are a newbie and just learned about Crypto yesterday.On his roadmap, he even mentions Jack Ma of AlibabaQuoteThis matter is to recommend taichicoin to Alibaba's Jack Ma, because he is a fan of taichi and hopes that he can help taichicoin develop.
